alert.note: Alert for Newton; Rockdale (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 3:29PM EST until further notice by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City GA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Georgia... Little Haynes Creek at Dial Mill Rd near Milstead affecting Rockdale and Newton Counties. For the Yellow River Basin...including Suwanee, Lawrenceville, Plantation Rd Lawrenceville, Lilburn, Tanglewood Drive Snellville, Snellville, Snellville, Silver Hill Rd Stone Mtn, Lithonia, Stone Mountain, Lee Road below Snellville, Lithonia, Lithonia, Lithonia, Milstead, Gees Mill Road, Snellville, Loganville, Milstead, Milstead, Milstead, Rocky Plains...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Little Haynes Creek at Dial Mill Rd near Milstead. * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins in the woodlands and fields along the creek upstream and downstream from the gage on Dial Mill Road. Some low lying portions of residential backyards on River Ridge Trail will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 10.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:45 PM EST Tuesday was 10.6 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 10.8 feet on 02/07/2020. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 330 AM EST.
